pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Individual wall segments instead of polylines

content.raw: I may be misremembering, but here's what I recall from our decisions: I thought it would be good to require a hot key for snapping, because (in my experience) that's more standard. Illustrator, for example, doesn't snap unless you hold a hot key. We'll need to add a tool tip/hint for that somewhere. I can't for the life of me remember why we reevaluated snapping...there was something else that could snap, but it didn't make sense to snap by default. What was that? I remember not wanting walls to snap by default, while this other thing does not snap by default...
